'''Brown & Gray''' is a British/American [[country-pop]] duo based in [[London]] and [[Los Angeles]]. The duo is composed of singer/songwriters [[Kaci Brown]] and [[Sam Gray (musician)|Sam Gray]].

== History ==
[[File:Brown & Gray at Stagecoach 2018.jpg|alt=Brown & Gray|left|thumb|Brown & Gray performing at [[Stagecoach Festival|Stagecoach]] 2018 on the [[SiriusXM]] Spotlight stage.]]
[[Sam Gray (musician)|Sam]] and [[Kaci Brown|Kaci]] first started working together as Brown & Gray after Gray wrote a country song, but wasn't satisfied with the vocals. Management at Notting Hill Music brought Brown into the project, and the song developed into what is known today as "Top Down".<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://wranglernetwork.com/news/brown-gray-on-music-row-live/|title=Brown & Gray on Sharla McCoy's Music Row Live!|work=Wrangler Network|access-date=2018-01-25|language=en-US}}</ref> "Top Down" was released in mid-2017, and was soon featured substantially by [[Apple Music]] and [[Radio Disney#Radio Disney Country|Radio Disney Country]].<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://nottinghillmusic.com/watch-the-official-video-for-top-down-by-brown-gray/|title=Watch the Official video for 'Top Down' by Brown & Gray – Notting Hill Music|website=nottinghillmusic.com|language=en-US|access-date=2018-01-25}}</ref> Since September 2017, the video for "Top Down" has garnered over 860k views on YouTube.<ref>{{Citation|last=NHMM, LLC|title=BROWN & GRAY - Top Down (Official Video)|date=2017-09-07|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PiRpXCUFj28|accessdate=2018-01-25}}</ref> That same month, [[Siriusxm|SiriusXM]]'s country music station, [[The Highway (Sirius XM)|The Highway]], named Brown & Gray as a Highway Find Artist.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/onthehighway/posts/10155026226035677|title=SiriusXM The Highway|website=www.facebook.com|language=en|access-date=2018-01-25}}</ref>

Brown & Gray also performed a number of shows as part of The Highway Finds Tour: Fall 2017.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.laweekly.com/event/high-valley-adam-doleac-brown-and-gray-8869933|title=High Valley, Adam Doleac, Brown & Gray|website=L.A. Weekly|access-date=2018-01-25}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.livenation.com/events/704364-dec-8-2017-siriusxm-pres-the-highway-finds-tour-feat-high-valley-adam-doleac|title=Excited about SiriusXM pres The Highway Finds Tour feat High Valley & Adam Doleac|website=Live Nation|access-date=2018-01-25}}</ref> In early 2018, [[CMT (U.S. TV channel)|CMT]] chose to select Brown & Gray as part of their CMT Discovery Artist program.<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.cmt.com/news/1790476/cmt-artist-discovery-grows-with-five-rising-acts-2/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180124011746/http://www.cmt.com/news/1790476/cmt-artist-discovery-grows-with-five-rising-acts-2/|url-status=dead|archive-date=January 24, 2018|title=CMT Artist Discovery Grows With Five Rising Acts|work=CMT News|access-date=2018-01-25}}</ref> In April 2018, Brown & Gray performed at [[Stagecoach Festival|Stagecoach]] in [[Indio, California|Indio]], CA on the [[SiriusXM]] Spotlight Stage.<ref>{{Cite news|url=https://www.usatoday.com/story/life/music/2018/04/27/stagecoach-2018-garthcoach-garth-brooks/557205002/|title=Stagecoach 2018 is more than just Garthcoach|work=USA TODAY|access-date=2018-05-01|language=en}}</ref>

== Members ==

* [[Kaci Brown]] - vocals
* [[Sam Gray (musician)|Sam Gray]] - guitar and vocals
